description: Number of connected triangle-free graphs on n unlabeled nodes.

Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Triangle-Free Graph
crossrefs: Inverse Euler transform of A006785.  Table of graphs on n nodes with clique number k is A126744.
author: _Peter J. Cameron_
